about_the_game:
In Railink you take on the role of a railroad engineer. You start your job with modest funds. As you connect houses to the railroad you receive more funds, allowing you to expand your railroad. If you do your job well, you will be able to connect all inhabitants. Once all inhabitants in one area are connected, it is time to move on and face the next challenge!

The mechanics and style of Railink are simple, allowing you to get started quickly. Starting a level takes only one click. Great for casual play.

Nevertheless, the game features over 30 puzzles, ranging from smaller puzzles to larger worlds that take some serious effort to complete!

This is a game for those who just want to build, puzzle and optimize, with simple rules that can be taught in a few minutes - which the included tutorial will do for you.

  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500

short_description: Railink takes you on a colorful puzzle/strategy adventure across deserts, icescapes and everything in between. Your job is to link up the remote Railink inhabitants to the rail network, one house at a time. Along the way you will face steep cliffs, vast waterways and tall mountains.
